paper_abstract: Implicit curves and surfaces are extensively used in interpolation, approximation and blending. [Li J, Hoschek J, Hartmann E. G(n-1)-functional splines for interpolation and approximation of curves, surfaces and solids. Computer Aided Geometric Design 1990;7:209-20] presented a functional method for constructing G(n-1) curves and surfaces which are called functional splines. In this paper, functional splines with different degrees of smoothness are presented and applied to some typical problems. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Functional splines with different degrees of smoothness and their applications
